
Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2016-04-10)
-----------------------------------------

* Add commandline support with Excel batch reporting
* Moved development status from Alpha to Beta

0.2.0 (2016-04-03)
-----------------------------------------

* EpubCheck results as native python objects
* More documentation

0.1.0 (2016-04-01)
-----------------------------------------

* First release on PyPI.
